thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 7 of 65
thread.title: Clinton

author: Clinton
title: Clinton
text: I had the pleasure to work with Nate. I called Nate to help me book my annual father son trip. I am the son. I wanted to surprise my father by taking care of all the reservations and financials. I called into Blue Sun and explained to Nate what I was looking for and what price range I was in. I wasn't the easiest case since I am flying in from Seattle and my father from Cleveland,OH. Nate was able to get us a highly rated all inclusive resort with airfare for my price range. To make it better he has us on the same connecting flight! I am 100% pleased and happy with my call to Nate. I would recommend him to anyone!
